text: Spend gold to access an ancient chart promising a quicker route, or continue cautiously along known waters.
Pay a toll to skilled starlit navigators for a swifter course, or stick to established maps and conserve gold.
An enigmatic mist engulfs your convoy, revealing an ancient shrine. The path branches, presenting a choice.
Melodic whispers waft across the waves, leading to a hidden lagoon. Two distinct paths unfurl before you.
Fellow High Elves, skilled in seafaring, request to join your maritime endeavors and contribute their expertise.
A group of skilled High Elf sailors seeks to merge their journey with yours, under a mutual agreement.
An experienced group of High Elf warriors offers their aid to your convoy, pledging to enhance your crew's combat prowess.
Phoenix king decided to send a reinforcement to this convoy. What kind of reinforcement do you want?
A notorious pirate ship emerges from the mist, its captain demanding tribute or the promise of violence.
A corsair ship sails alongside, its captain issuing an ultimatum: Surrender cargo or face imminent assault.
A menacing pirate ship looms ahead, blocking your path. The choice before you is clear, but not without risk.
The silhouette of a pirate vessel emerges on the horizon. A decision must be made swiftly to ensure your convoy's fate.
A notorious pirate ship looms ahead, its ominous presence undeniable. A chilling message arrives from the pirate captain, revealing an unexpected connection.

Opt for the familiar path, conserving resources and navigating with prudence.
Invest gold in the ancient chart, embracing the risk for potential swifter travel.
Decline the offer, preserving your funds and navigating through known routes, albeit at a potentially slower pace.
Pay the navigators' toll for guided navigation, trusting in their expertise for a faster journey.
Uncover forgotten High Elf relics and secure valuable cargo.
Mysterious energies subtly mend your ship and crew, ensuring their well-being.
Gentle breezes from the lagoon grant your crew revitalizing reprieve, offering healing.
Recover forgotten treasures and rare cargo concealed beneath its waters.

Engage in a battle against the pirates to secure your convoy's assets.
Relinquish some cargo, avoiding conflict and gaining temporary safety.
Engage in combat with the corsairs, safeguarding your convoy's cargo and crew.
Part with cargo, preserving your convoy and escaping immediate danger.
Battle the pirates for a chance at glory and to secure your convoy's safety.
Choose a safer route to bypass the pirate threat, although it will cost you time.
Engage in combat, testing your convoy's strength against the pirate crew.
Opt for safety over confrontation, but expect delays as you navigate unfamiliar waters.
Choose defiance, gearing up for battle against the pirates and protecting your crew.
Sacrifice the crew member who was an old nemesis of the pirate captain to placate the pirates and avoid hostilities.
